thread.title: Win the ultimate family attraction package
thread.title_full: Win the ultimate family attraction package - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win the ultimate family attraction package
text: Win the ultimate family attraction package with 4 tickets to SEA LIFE London Aquarium including a VIP Experience of Snorkelling with Sharks AND 4 tickets to London’s newest family attraction, Shrek’s Adventure! London, including a stunning photobook to mark your journey to Far, Far Away. As well as entry into SEA LIFE London Aquarium with over 500 species of marine life, get closer than ever before with some of the most amazing creatures of the deep as you snorkel amongst an array of 6 species of different sharks including Sand Tigers, Brown, Black Tip Reef and Nurse Sharks in our dramatic Pacific Reef display. Head next door to Shrek’s Adventure! London where you will experience 10 live fairy-tale themed shows, iconic sets, captivating storytelling and a one of a kind 4D magical flying bus ride! Brought to you by DreamWorks Tours. Laugh, touch and smell the adventure as you play your park in finding Shrek at London’s newest family attraction! Competition ends on Monday, 30 November 2015 Terms and Conditions Online Form - Win the ultimate family attraction package telegraph.co.uk
